# Next.js Gaussian Splatting Viewer Project

## Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project with TypeScript
- [x] Install three.js and Gaussian Splatting dependencies
- [x] Create lobby page with start button
- [x] Create viewer page with three.js integration
- [x] Setup public folder for .ply/.splat model files
- [x] Test and run development server

## Project Details
- Framework: Next.js 14+ with App Router
- Language: TypeScript
- 3D Library: three.js with @react-three/fiber
- Feature: Gaussian Splatting visualization
- Pages: Lobby (landing) and Viewer
